protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the production of spermine from spermidine and decarboxylated S-adenosylmethionine (dcSAM).

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring alkyl or aryl (other than methyl) groups
cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
cellular amino acid derivative metabolic process
